TITLE BBQ Beer Chicken Skewers with Avocado Corn and Feta Salsa

{[BBQ Sauce]
# In a medium pot combine:{ [1/2 cup beer] [3/4 cup ketchup] [1/2 cup honey] [2 tsp dijon mustard] [2 tsp Worcestershire sauce] [2 tsp chipotle powder] [1 tsp smoked paprika] [1 tsp garlic powder] [salt]}
}

# Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. The sauce should thicken.

{[Chicken]
# In a nonreactive container combine [2 lbs chicken breast[, cut into bite-size chunks]] and a [1/2 cup BBQ Sauce].
# Skewer and grill chicken.
}

{[Corn and Feta Salsa]
# In a medium bowl combine:{ [2 item [diced] jalapeno][2 cup [cooked] corn] [1/3 cup [chopped] cilantro] [1/4 cup [chopped] basil] [2 tbl lime juice] [1 tbl lemon juice] [1 tbl apple cider vinegar] [1/3 cup [crumbled] feta cheese]}
}

# Serve grilled chicken with the $[Corn and Feta Salsa].
